entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 34 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: SSW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
